name: pnp-sp-fx-aces-ace-servicehealth
title: Status of Tenant Service Helath
shortDescription: Adaptive Card displays of Microsoft 365 Service Health
longDescription: ACE with a card view and multiple quick views to display the status of the affected services in a Microsft 365 tenant.

references.name: Viva Connections Extensibility guidance
references.description: Adaptive Card Extensions are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page.
